# äºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼ˆBinary Treeï¼‰

# å‰ã€ä¸­ã€ååºéå†

var traverse = function(root){
  if(!root) return root;
  
  // å‰åºä½ç½®
  traverse(root.left);
  // ä¸­åºä½ç½®
  traverse(root.right);
  // ååºä½ç½®
}
  • å‰åºéå†ï¼šåœ¨åˆšè¿›å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ—¶å€™æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œåªèƒ½è·å–åˆ°çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

# å±‚åºéå†

var levelTraverse = function(root){
	if(!root) return;
	const q = [];
	q.push(root);
	
	while(q.length){
		let curLevelLen = q.length;
		for(let i = 0; i < curLevelLen; i++){
			let tem = q.shift();
			if(tem.left) q.push(tem.left);
			if(tem.right) q.push(tem.right);
		}
	}
}

# LeetCode 236. äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„æœ€è¿‘å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆ (opens new window)

 var lowestCommonAncestor = function(root, p, q) {
    if(!root || root.val == p || root.val == q) return root;
    var left = lowestCommonAncestor(root.left, p, q);
    var right = lowestCommonAncestor(root.right, p, q);
    if(left && right) return root;
    return left ? left : right;
};

# LeetCode 124. äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸­çš„æœ€å¤§è·¯å¾„å’Œ (opens new window)

var maxPathSum = function(root) {
  let max = -Infinity;
  function traverse(node) {
      if (!node) return 0; // èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™è¿”å›
      let l = Math.max(0,traverse(node.left))
      let r = Math.max(0,traverse(node.right))
      max = Math.max(max, (l+r+node.val)) // æ›´æ–°æœ€ä¼˜è·¯å¾„å’Œ
      return Math.max(l,r)+node.val;
  }


  traverse(root); // ä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å§‹éå†
  return  max;
};

# LeetCode 968. ç›‘æ§äºŒå‰æ ‘ (opens new window)

var minCameraCover = function(root) {
  let camera = 0;
  function traverse(node) {
      if (!node) return 2; // èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™è¿”å›
      let l = traverse(node.left);
      let r = traverse(node.right);
      if(l == 0 || r == 0){
        node.val = 1;
        camera ++;
      }else if(l==1 || r ==1){
        node.val = 2
      }
      return node.val;
  }


  traverse(root); // ä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å§‹éå†
  if(root.val == 0){
    root.val = 1;
    camera++;
  }
  return  camera;
};
